fullName.jp: ヤン・ファン・ライデン

description.jp:
筋骨隆々の肉体を持つ 修行僧の国
ファブールの僧兵長。
クリスタルを守ろうとするセシルらに同
行し 鍛え抜いた技と 不屈の精神とを武
器に 仲間の窮地を幾度となく救った。
威勢のいい妻にだけは頭が上がらない
愛妻家でもある。
description.gl: A muscle-bound monk and leader of the kingdom of Fabul who accompanies Cecil on his quest to protect the Crystals. His strict discipline and unyielding spirit has gotten his allies out of trouble on countless occasions. He cowers before no one─with the exception of his beloved wife.

jp.text: 我々が敵を引きつけ……たたく！
お初にお目にかかります
無茶な！\nそなたのほうがもたぬ！
ここは私が引き受ける！

gl.text: We need only draw the enemy here—and crush them!
It is an honor to meet you.
You'll be the one it destroys!
I will take care of things in here.
Oh、 I know you well、 blackguard!
It has been an honor fighting with all of you!

name.jp: コールアビリティ_ヤン

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Kick (C)]
• Increases own BRV by 1.5 before attacking
• BRV attack hit count becomes 6
• Increases total BRV potency by 280%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% MAX BRV
• Increases HP damage dealt to non-target by 30%
rank_up_desc.jp:
「けり【C】」使用時
・BRV攻撃前に自身のBRV1.5倍
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が6HITになり合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・ターゲット以外に与えるHPダメージ小アップ

name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_ヤン

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Oboro Strike (C)]
• Increases BRV gain based on ATK by 20%
• Becomes 6-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + ST HP attack delivered twice
• Increases total BRV potency by 40%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% MAX BRV
rank_up_desc.jp:
「オボロ懸かり【C】」使用時
・攻撃力依存のBRV加算量小アップ
・4HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋単体HP攻撃を2回行うが
　6HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋単体HP攻撃を2回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分

desc.en:
5-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

When breaking a target or attacking a broken target:
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 130% Max BRV
• Deals 80% HP damage to non-targets
• Grants [Wife's Encouragement] for 1 turn

[Wife's Encouragement] has the following effects:
• Raises Attack by 50%
• Increases stolen BRV overflow limit by 30%
desc.gl:
5-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 130%, deals 80% HP damage to non-targets when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
